welcomesurvey-save-confirmation-title: Thanks! Your responses have been saved.
welcomesurvey-save-confirmation-text:
Your answers will be used to help us try to make Wikipedia better for all new users.

To learn more about how these optional responses are used, see the survey $1.
welcomesurvey-subtitle: Help us make Wikipedia better for our new users like you by answering a few optional questions.
welcomesurvey-sidebar-privacy-text: To learn more about how these optional responses are used, see the survey $1.
welcomesurvey-sidebar-editing-text: Almost every page can be edited by anyone, and hundreds of changes are made every hour to add content, correct mistakes, and improve readability. The following pages can help if you’re interested in contributing.
welcomesurvey-question-reason-label: Why did you create your account today?
welcomesurvey-question-reason-option-edi: To fix a typo or error in a Wikipedia article
To add or change information to a Wikipedia article
welcomesurvey-question-reason-option-add: To add a photo or image to a Wikipedia article
welcomesurvey-question-reason-option-new: To create a new Wikipedia article
welcomesurvey-question-reason-option-pro: I'm participating in a program, class, or event
welcomesurvey-question-mentor-info: We are considering starting a program for more experienced editors to help newer users with editing. Are you interested in being contacted to get help with editing?
welcomesurvey-question-edited-option-no-: No, I didn’t know I could edit Wikipedia
welcomesurvey-question-email-help: We noticed you didn’t enter an email when creating this account. It’s highly recommended, since an email is needed for account recovery if you ever lose your password. NOTE: Your email address is not revealed when other users contact you.
